## Source: ossf-package-analysis (43628222f024edc8e6a0df4d08f4800b0bb0fa0edc3745b1b770e9eefea6cc97)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'zora1abs-protoc01-sdk' @ 999.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
